languages.text: "Это был препарат, который мы, сслиты, вводим себе, чтобы не мерзнуть. Теряюсь в догадках, во что он сейчас превращает твою кровеносную систему... Но я впечатлен твоей стойкостью, как и твоим безграничным нахальством. Чего тебе надо от меня?"

"That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"
languages.original_text: "Это был препарат, который мы, сслиты, вводим себе, чтобы не мерзнуть. Теряюсь в догадках, во что он сейчас превращает твою кровеносную систему... Но я впечатлен твоей стойкостью, как и твоим безграничным нахальством. Чего тебе надо от меня?"

traits.locale_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your unfettered brazenness. What do you want from me?"

"That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your unfettered brazenness. What do you want from me?"

"That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"

"That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"

"That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"

languages.text: “那是我们蛇人专用的药剂，用来保护我们不受寒冷影响。至于它和你的血液起了什么样的反应，我恐怕根本想象不到……不过你的毅力，还有你出色的胆识，给我留下了深刻的印象。你想从我这里得到什么？”
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"

traits.locale_text: “那是我们西里斯专用的药剂，用来保护我们不受寒冷影响。至于它和你的血液起了什么样的反应，我恐怕根本想象不到……不过你的毅力，还有你出色的胆识，给我留下了深刻的印象。你想从我这里得到什么？”

languages.text: «Eso era un agente que los Sslyth nos inyectamos para protegernos del frío. Solo puedo imaginar los estragos que estará haciendo en tu torrente sanguíneo... pero me impresionan tu resistencia... y tu osadía. ¿Qué quieres de mí?».
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"

traits.locale_text: «Eso era un agente que los Sslyth nos inyectamos para protegernos del frío. Solo puedo imaginar los estragos que estará haciendo en tu torrente sanguíneo... pero me impresionan tu resistencia... y tu osadía. ¿Qué quieres de mí?».

languages.text: 「今のは我々ススリスが冷気から身を守るために注入する物質だ。貴様の体内で何が起きているのかは想像に難くないが…貴様の不屈の精神と図太さには感心する。何が望みだ？」
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"

traits.locale_text: 「今のは我々ススリスが冷気から身を守るために注入する物質だ。貴様の体内で何が起きているのかは想像に難くないが…貴様の不屈の精神と図太さには感心する。何が望みだ？」

languages.text: "Das war ein Agens, das wir Sslyth uns injizieren, um uns vor der Kälte zu schützen. Ich kann nur vermuten, was es gerade in Eurem Blutkreislauf anstellt ... Doch Eure Stärke beeindruckt mich — und Eure grenzenlose Unverfrorenheit. Was wollt Ihr von mir?"
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"

traits.locale_text: "Das war ein Agens, das wir Sslyth uns injizieren, um uns vor der Kälte zu schützen. Ich kann nur vermuten, was es gerade in Eurem Blutkreislauf anstellt ... Doch Eure Stärke beeindruckt mich — und Eure grenzenlose Unverfrorenheit. Was wollt Ihr von mir?"

languages.text: « C'était un agent que les Sslyths comme moi s'injectent pour se protéger du froid. J'ose à peine imaginer ses effets dans votre sang... Mais votre cran m'impressionne, de même que vos nerfs d'acier. Qu'est-ce que vous attendez de moi ? »
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"

traits.locale_text: « C'était un agent que les Sslyths comme moi s'injectent pour se protéger du froid. J'ose à peine imaginer ses effets dans votre sang... Mais votre cran m'impressionne, de même que vos nerfs d'acier. Qu'est-ce que vous attendez de moi ? »

languages.text: "O iğnede mensup olduğum Sslyth ırkının soğuktan korunmak için kullandığı bir madde vardı. Şu anda kanında neler döndüğünü hayal dahi edemiyorum... Ama ne yalan söyleyeyim, etkilendim. Cesursun, cüretinin sınırı yok. Ne istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "That was an agent that we Sslyth inject to protect ourselves from the cold. I can only guess what it's doing to your bloodstream right now... But I am impressed by your fortitude — and your limitless nerve. What do you want from me?"

traits.locale_text: "O iğnede mensup olduğum Sslyth ırkının soğuktan korunmak için kullandığı bir madde vardı. Şu anda kanında neler döndüğünü hayal dahi edemiyorum... Ama ne yalan söyleyeyim, etkilendim. Cesursun, cüretinin sınırı yok. Ne istiyorsun?"
